definition: A symbol or sign used to represent ownership or origin, typically found on products or goods. It is commonly used to indicate the brand or trademark associated with a particular item.

examples.german: Die Marke des Autos ist BMW.
examples.english: The brand of the car is BMW.
I like to wear branded clothing.

examples.english: The brand of the perfume is exclusive.
